column5: IF the storms let up I am planning on a Scugog evening fish and figure that lake drainage/filling is going to play a factor.  I am guessing that it flows in from North and North East of Ceserea and flows out where by Highway 7/canals.  OR  should I just wait a few more days?  forrest

Nope...you got it backwards.  Scugog is a spring-fed/watershed lake. No lakes of any size drain into Scugog, only creeks and a small river or two.  Water flows out the north-end, through the Scugog River, Lindsay and on into Sturgeon Lake.
